meaning_str.bing:
v. 报价；引用；引述；举例说明
n. 报价；引号；引文
网络. 引用第；援引；引证

报价；引用；引述；举例说明

引用；引述；为（企业的股份）上市；挂牌；出价；报价；举例说明
引用；引语；引文；语录；引号

1.en: She worked, to quote her daughter, "as if there was no tomorrow" .
1.cn: 用她女儿的话讲，她工作起来“好像没有明天似的”。

2.en: Please provide assistance and a quote for how much it would take to instruct me how to solve this issue.
2.cn: 请提供援助和为多少则需指导我如何解决这个问题的报价。

3.en: Please quote me with how much you can run a good campaign for.
3.cn: 请报上多少你可以运行一个良好的运动对我来说。

0.en: Why? Because I wouldn't give you a quote?
0.cn: 为什么？因为我不愿意给你评论吗？

1.en: Wow. Pretty girl. Bad habit. Don't quote me. All right?
1.cn: 先生……漂亮姑娘，坏习惯，别引用这句，好吗？

2.en: Kublai, you quote whatever holiness suits you at the time.
2.cn: 忽必烈，你总是引用最有利于你的圣人之言。

3.en: I beg to disagree. A girlfriend shall be deemed quote living with un-quote Leonard when she has stayed over for A: ten consecutive nights.
3.cn: 我有不同意见，某女性被认定为跟莱纳德，前引号同居，后引号的时间条件是，第一：连续十晚。

4.en: He told me a quote. "A sad soul can kill quicker than a germ."
4.cn: 他还给我引用了一段，"一个悲伤的灵魂能比细菌让你死的更快"。

5.en: You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them.
5.cn: 你可以给他们加上引号，不同意他们的观点，赞美或诽谤他们。

6.en: Video was Take On Me by A-ha. His favorite quote was from Superman.
6.cn: MV是阿哈乐队的《接受我》。他最喜欢的一句台词引自《超人》。

7.en: Okay. Mm. You have a favorite quote? I do. You're never wrong to do the right thing.
7.cn: 好咯，嗯，你有座右铭吗？有。“做对的事情永远不会错。”

8.en: Lady Grantham is to be, and I quote, "Allowed to step down after so many years of noble service."
8.cn: 老夫人将会，原话是"在多年辛勤效力后将可以辞职"。

9.en: He recommended that I go see the third Matrix movie because it was, and I quote, "just as good as the first one".
9.cn: 他推荐我去看黑客帝国三，因为他的原话是"这部跟第一部一样精彩"。

10.en: Yeah. Look at his list. Jim Henson for, quote, "Putting a terrifying, giant yellow bird on television and in my nightmares."
10.cn: 看看这名单。吉姆·韩生[芝麻街布偶之父]，"在电视上创造了一个又大又黄又吓人的鸟引发我噩梦连连"。

11.en: I'm urging these governors to consolidate their polling sites and create quote, unquote "voting centers" so that people feel safe to come out and vote.
11.cn: 我督促这些州长合并投票站建立"投票中心"这样民众会觉得出门投票是安全的。

12.en: And when I announced that General Brockhart was going to be my running mate, the president's campaign said, and I quote, It's a shame the general traded in patriotism for careerism.
12.cn: 而当我宣布布洛哈特将军将成为我的竞选伙伴后，总统竞选团队竟称，我原话引用，"为将军拿爱国换仕途的行径感到惋惜"。

13.en: Priya, if you're experiencing any tension or awkwardness, it may stem from the fact that Leonard and Penny used to, if I may quote Howard, "do the dance with no pants." Sheldon! Really?
13.cn: 普丽娅，如果你觉得有些紧张或者尴尬，很可能是因为莱纳德和佩妮以前曾经，用霍华德的话来说叫做"赤裸共舞"。谢尔顿！你非得这么说吗？

14.en: But as you are aware, sir, the employee handbook clearly states, and I quote, "No employee may, in part or in whole, commit the Krabby Patty secret formula to any recorded written or visual form, including memories, dreams, and or needlepoint."
14.cn: 但是，老板，如你所知，员工手册上清楚写着“任何人不得以记忆、做梦、或是刺绣等方式将部分或全部蟹黄堡秘方转换为任何书面记录或是视觉形式。”
